job_title: Informatica MDM and SAP MDG Business System Analyst
jd:
Informatica MDM and SAP MDG Business System Analyst - IBM/Paypal

About the Company

IBM/Paypal

Job Overview

Urgent need for a Business System Analyst (BSA) position requiring a strong understanding of Master Data Management concepts, industry data standards, and data governance that support Finance operations.

Location and Work Arrangement

100% Remote, Anywhere in US.

Key Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with Product managers, Operational Managers, and external vendors to ensure consistent data management and accurate information flow.

Required Qualifications

  • At least 8 years past professional Business Analyst or consulting experience.
  • Experience with Informatica MDM and SAP MDG.
  • Strong customer service skills and ability to elicit and document complex business requirements.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Strong understanding of system and software development, technical application architecture design, and testing methodologies.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience with master data and data quality.
  • Project management experience organizing tasks and tracking deliverables.

What We Offer

Not specified.

How to Apply

Contact SAPNA at sapna@itecsus.com.
